alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 11:06AM EST until March 10 at 4:36AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River and Eel River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water surrounds homes in River Edge Estates. A few streets flood in Ravenswood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1115 PM EST /1015 PM CST/.
